txt.en: 'You have done well, [placeholder], and have brought me hope that the spread of this disease among the cave-claws has been curbed.'
You have defeated many cave-claws in the south Trollshaws
Some Disease Affects Them
Defeated cave-claws in the South Trollshaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Ost Dúrgonn is north-east of the Last Bridge and the whiskerback cave-claws that make their home among the ruins have been corrupted by some foul disease. If they have begun attacking travellers in this land, it is our duty to fight them, wherever they be found.'
'Rochwen has noticed that cave-claws in the South Trollshaws have also been afflicted with this disease? That does not bode well for travellers in this land, [placeholder].'

Cave-claws can be found throughout the South Trollshaws, but especially Ost Dúrgonn, north of the road and Barachen's camp.\n\nYou should cull the numbers of the cave-claws in the South Trollshaws, as they present a threat to travel in their current frenzied state.
'I am glad that you defeated some of the diseased cave-claws in the South Trollshaws for Rochwen, [placeholder]. It is an unpleasant task, but it is necessary.'

Rochwen is north of Barachen's camp, by the road that runs through the South Trollshaws.\n\nRochwen will be pleased to know that you have defeated some of the diseased cave-claws that come forth from the ruins of Ost Dúrgonn near the Last Bridge.
'The cave-claws of Ost Dúrgonn grow more aggressive every day.'
'Some fell disease is at work among the beasts of the Trollshaws.'
'Rochwen sent word to me of disease among the cave-claws of Ost Dúrgonn.'
You have slain many cave-claws in the South Trollshaws and once again made the road safe for travellers.
DNT -- Will not be seen
'You did well to aid Rochwen by fighting the diseased cave-claws to the south.'

Cave-claws can be found throughout the South Trollshaws, but especially Ost Dúrgonn, north of the road and Barachen's camp.\n\nYou should cull the numbers of the cave-claws in the South Trollshaws, as they present a threat to travel in their current frenzied state.
Completed
Defeat cave-claws in the South Trollshaws ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You have defeated many cave-claws in the south Trollshaws.
Defeat cave-claws in the South Trollshaws
It is strange that cave-claws have swarmed out of their caves into the open sunlight. Perhaps something has stirred them into a feeding frenzy.
You should cull the numbers of the cave-claws in the South Trollshaws, as they present a threat to travel in their current frenzied state.
Feeding Frenzy

Cave-claws can be found throughout the South Trollshaws, but especially Ost Dúrgonn, north of the road and Barachen's camp.\n\nYou should cull the numbers of the cave-claws in the South Trollshaws, as they present a threat to travel in their current frenzied state.
